AED.helpText: Name cannot contain any special characters.Please enter only alphabets
Address cannot be more than 185 characters. Only digits,alphabets,-,/ and spaces are allowed

For a phone number in Vietnam select the country code +84 followed by the 2 or 3 digit area code. The phone number will be 9 digits for mobiles and 10 digits for landlines. If you are unsure of this number please check with your receiver.

Account number must be 8 numeric digits. Please remove all hyphens, spaces or special characters when entering this number. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver's local bank branch.
AED.errorLabel: Receiver Account Number / IBAN is required

BDT.errorLabel: Receiver Account Number / IBAN is required

CAD.helpText: Name cannot contain any special characters.Please enter only alphabets
Name cannot contain any special characters.Please enter only alphabets
Address cannot be more than 185 characters. Only digits,alphabets,-,/ and spaces are allowed

The Postal code consists of 6 alphanumeric characters, please remove all hyphens, spaces or special characters when entering this code. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver.
The Financial Institution Number, or Bank Code, is a 3 digit number. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver’s local bank branch.
The Branch Transit Number, or Branch Code, is a 5 digit number. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver’s local bank branch.

SWIFT/BIC: A SWIFT code, also known as BIC code, consists of 8-11 alphanumeric characters. Please remove all hyphens, spaces or special characters when entering this number. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver’s local bank branch.

Account number must be 7 to 35 numeric digits. Please remove all hyphens, spaces or special characters when entering this number. If you are unsure of this number, please check online or with your receiver's local bank branch.
CAD.errorLabel: Receiver Account Number / IBAN is required

CNY.helpText: Name cannot contain any special characters.Please enter only alphabets
Address cannot be more than 185 characters. Only digits,alphabets,-,/ and spaces are allowed
Card number should be 16-19 digits. Please key in only numeric characters. If you are unsure of this number, please check with your receiver.
CNY.errorLabel: Receiver Debit Card Number is required

CNY.helpText: The phone number will be 11 digits starting with 1. If you are unsure of this number please check with your receiver.

Name cannot contain any special characters.Please enter only alphabets

For a phone number in South Korea enter the country code +82 followed by the 1 or 2 digit area code. If you are calling a mobile phone, enter the country code +82 followed by the mobile number. If you are not sure of the area code, please refer to this list: https://countrycode.org/southkorea
